column4: Teleflex recalls breathing tubes worldwide after reports of 4 deaths
column5: (Reuters) - Teleflex Inc said on Monday it plans to recall some lots of its Hudson RCI Sheridan endotracheal tubes used for helping patients breathe, following reports of four deaths.
column6: The worldwide recall comes after the products were found to have an increased occurrence of being disconnected from the breathing circuit, resulting in insufficient oxygen supply, the company said.
column7: Teleflex, which said the recall had been labeled as Class I by the U.S. health regulator, advised patients to immediately discontinue use of the products and return the affected products.

column4: PG&E to get pulled out of S&P 500, shares near 2001 lows
column5: ** Embattled power utility company PG&E Corp PCG.N will be replaced by healthcare equipment maker Teleflex Inc TFX.N in the S&P 500 .SPX on Friday
column6: ** PG&E shares were down 4.1 pct, trading near 2001 lows following its plans to seek Chapter 11 protection in the wake of large potential claims related to California’s catastrophic wildfires
column7: ** Session’s decline bring PCG’s WTD decline to ~61 pct; Co said on Sunday CEO Geisha Williams stepped down and announced bankruptcy protection plans on Monday
column8: ** Teleflex will be replaced by consumer finance co Green Dot GDOT.O in the S&P MidCap 400 index, S&P Global said; TFX shares dip 1.2 pct
column9: ** Softwood pulp producer Mercer International Inc MERC.O will replace Green Dot in S&P SmallCap 600 index; MERC jumps 15.7 pct and GDOT drops 2.7 pct
column10: ** Changes will be reflected before trading opens on Friday, S&P said
